document.full_text: camilo villegas felt he was on track to finally finding the right balance at augusta national after firing a two-under-par 70 in the opening round of the masters on thursday.
document.title: villegas finally finding right balance at augusta
lines_and_colors: camilo villegas felt he was on track to finally finding the right balance at augusta national after firing a two-under-par 70 in the opening round of the masters on thursday.
